testcase.name: should correctly apply default styles and derive class names
should merge styles provided by the user with default styles
should also work if a substyle instance is provided as `style`
should take a modifier selection function as second argument
should apply the selected modifiers also on the style supplied by the user
should give precedence to styles supplied by the user, regardless the modifiers specificity
should preserve styles if styling props and modifiers are shallow equal
should support providing a props decorator function via context
